m_szDocTitle: Systems and methods for visualizing and managing telepresence devices in healthcare networks - Intouch Technologies, Inc.
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Systems and methods for visualizing and managing telepresence devices in healthcare networks United States Patent 8902278 Abstract: Disclosed herein are various embodiments of systems and methods for visualizing, analyzing, and managing telepresence devices operating in a telepresence network of healthcare facilities. A user may selectively view a global view of all telepresence devices, telepresence devices within a particular region, the details of a particular telepresence device, and/or the details of a particular healthcare facility. At one viewing level,
